programme.title: Protection of property by the Declaration of Independence
programme.short_synopsis: Does the Declaration of Independence guarantee the protection of personal property?
programme.medium_synopsis: The possible inclusion of the phrase 'life, liberty and the protection of property' in the Declaration of Independence, and the outbreak of war in 1939.
